description: SSC 2BP3-157288 ITPro # 101104 - Large Format Printer for DND- Amendment 000
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Large Format Printer for DND (Department of National Defence)

### Tender Details

* **Tender Number**: SSC-24-00026266
* **Publication Date**: April 8, 2024
* **Closing Date**: April 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contact Information**
	+ Name: Channary Luy
	+ Phone: 613-323-5347
	+ Fax: 613-123-4567
	+ Email: [Channary.Luy@canada.ca](mailto:Channary.Luy@canada.ca)
	+ Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8, Canada

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence’s Assistant Deputy Minister of Public Affairs (ADM (PA)) Exhibits & Displays Section requires a large format printer to replace two existing 60” and 104” large format printers that are past their life cycle. This contract is for the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as the necessary training in French and English to allow users to access all of the required features of the equipment.

### Key Requirements

* Supply, delivery, and installation of a large format printer
* Training in French and English for users
* Replacement of two existing 60” and 104” large format printers

### Eligibility and Tendering Procedure

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers. Interested suppliers must submit a proposal in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender document. The tender document can be downloaded from the Shared Services Canada website.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this tender will focus on the following:

* Technical capability
* Price
* Timeliness of delivery
* Quality of training provided

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Region of Opportunity

The region of opportunity for this tender is the world, with a focus on Quebec (except National Capital Region).
